product_name: Kurgo Wander Dog Coat - Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The waterproof Wander Coat features a tough polyester shell and soft fleece lining that offers a thin insulation layer for your active dog as he plays outside in the cooler seasons.
short_description: The waterproof Wander Coat features a tough polyester shell and soft fleece lining that offers a thin insulation layer for your active dog as he plays outside in the cooler seasons.
